level.heading: SPECIAL PROVISIONS GOVERNING MASTER-METERED APARTMENT BUILDINGS (§ 21-429)

level.text: This section shall apply to all master-metered water and sewer accounts in residential rental apartment buildings billed directly to the owner, agent, lessor, or manager of the premises (hereinafter referred to as “owner”).
WASA shall provide the tenants with the opportunity to assume prospective financial responsibility for the water and sewer services pursuant to the provisions of §§ 428 and 430.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 1300, 1325 (February 12, 1993); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 5358 (June 18, 1999).
